channel.title: [PI] Need help adding theiving stall rewards
channel.description: Hey i need help adding rewards to a theiving stall when i click it it doesn't give me anything so i can't just go edit what it already has in the actionhandler.java please help.

item.title: [PI] Need help adding theiving stall rewards
item.dc:creator: @jummppy jummppy
item.description:
@jummppy wrote:

open Actionhandler.java and under the firstclickobject method add
case ####://the id
//the skill requirement
//the itmes it gives u
//the xp it gives u for the stall
//anything else?
break;

There your outline have fun mate and i know its a bad way to do it

If not, you just add that code in, under the correct case number. Or create your own should you need.
